page.title: 16FOOD FOR A DAY
page.content: Tuesday 11 June 1985. For breakfast I had Sugar Puffs.Sugar Puffs are balls of wheat covered insugar to which you add milk.I also had a glass of fruit juice. For my dinner I had ham roast potatoes and vegetables.For pudding I had carabar which is a biscuit with a toffee and chocolate coating.This was my school meal. When I went home after school I had some Chocamints.They are chocolates with mint in the middle. After playing outside I had my tea.I had cheese on toast.Toast is grilled bread and the cheese is melted on the top.This was followed by an apple and a bar of chocolate. Before bed I had my supper which was biscuits and a drink of hot cocoa.
